flawed_nl_solution:
He has to read 305 pages a week because 7 x 50 = <<7*50=305>>305
He has read 262 pages because 43+65+28+70+56 = <<43+65+28+70+56=262>>262
He has to read 43 pages on Saturday because 305-262 =<<305-262=43>>43

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 350, not 305. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
